module:
Module-level comment: 
/*
The 'enc' module is a system-on-chip (SoC) integration for encryption and communication. It orchestrates various sub-modules including UART, Wishbone bus arbitration, clock generation, APB and Wishbone interfaces, and timers. The module uses a 128-bit Wishbone bus with 10 slave devices, manages multiple clock domains, and incorporates test functionalities. It integrates an ARM-based processor core (a25_core) for central control and processing, along with dedicated modules for encryption, timing, and interrupt handling.
*/
